location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Captain Charles Pasley, Acting Envoy Extraordinary to Persia

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage; all the text along the left hand side of the body of the letter has been partially obscured, so the words at the end of each line can be difficult to read.

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the exchange of money to Eyn Piasters [piasters], the encouragement of Meerza Khaleel Khan to provide good intelligence for the British, and some information on the movement of ships.
